ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [RE: [eqbards] Need assistance please  ]    ]
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, Kelethin is where we go to buy pumice stones in between resses.  One night there were like 4 of us nekkid level 50 s stumbling around Kele trying to find
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, Kelethin is where we go to buy pumice stones in between resses. One
night there were like 4 of us nekkid level 50's stumbling around Kele trying
to find the vendor. I think he is either right by the bank or right by the
warriors guild which is by the bank (one platform over?) or was it the
bard's guild.... hmmm. Well, you can see why I hire a newbie to guide me
around Kele. But there is a merch somewhere near the Preist of Dischord
lift plats that sells these items - they look like light stones (egg shaped
pumice) or bottles (potions.)

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Lisa (Lilyana/Melodii)" <Lilyanatwin@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 1:35 PM
Subject: Re: [Re: [RE: [eqbards] Need assistance please ] ]


> I hope this isn't a stupid question but since I've had no need up until
> now....where would the local magic shop be in the GF/BB area?
>
> Melodii
>
> "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...> wrote:
>
> > Stop by the local magic shop and buy some egg shaped pumice stones.
Save
